update.description:
Update: 05/10/2020: 1. Radar now runs at 60fps. 2. Menu now added. 3. Adjustable colors via settings. 4. PMC & P Scav. 5. PMC name list. 6. Important & Group filters added. 7. Customizable important loot colors. 8. Togglable beam for all item filters. 9. Itemfiler JSON now supports new loot features. 10. Radar background default color is now darker. 11. Scalable loot & player names. 12. Launcher with auto updates.
TODO: Code clean up. Saving settings. Seperate loot filter color customization. Exfil is open. Finish Boss custom color. Change settings button color.
